languages.text: "О, не сомневаюсь. Только готова ли я выбрать именно тебя? Ты появил{mf|ся|ась} на борту за несколько часов до варп-прыжка и пока никак не проявил{mf||а} себя — пока что я испытываю сомнения касательно твоей пригодности для роли Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "О, не сомневаюсь. Только готова ли я выбрать именно тебя? Ты появил{mf|ся|ась} на борту за несколько часов до варп-прыжка и пока никак не проявил{mf||а} себя – пока что я испытываю сомнения касательно твоей пригодности для роли Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "О, не сомневаюсь. Только готова ли я выбрать именно тебя? Ты появил{mf|ся|ась} на борту за несколько часов до варп-прыжка и пока никак не проявил{mf||а} себя — пока что я испытываю сомнения касательно твоей пригодности для роли Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As it currently is, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of a Rogue Trader."

"Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As it currently is, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of a Rogue Trader."

"Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

"Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

"Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “噢，没错，你确实准备好了，是吧？但问题是，我有没有准备好选择你成为我的继承人呢？你仅仅是在亚空间跃迁的几个小时之前上了这艘船，还没有让我看到任何品质。就目前的情况而言，我怀疑你恐怕无法担任行商浪人这一重任。”
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “噢，没错，你确实准备好了，是吧？但问题是，我有没有准备好选择你成为我的继承人呢？你仅仅是在亚空间跃迁的几个小时之前上了这艘船，还没有让我看到任何品质。就目前的情况而言，我怀疑你恐怕无法担任行商浪人这一重任。”

languages.text: «Claro que lo estás. La pregunta es si yo estoy dispuesta a elegirte por encima de los otros. Has subido a bordo escasas horas antes del salto de disformidad y todavía no te has ganado ningún reconocimiento. Dadas las circunstancias, tengo serias dudas sobre tu idoneidad para el puesto de Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Claro que lo estás. La pregunta es si yo estoy dispuesta a elegirte por encima de los otros. Has subido a bordo escasas horas antes del salto de disformidad y todavía no te has ganado ningún reconocimiento. Dadas las circunstancias, tengo serias dudas sobre tu idoneidad para el puesto de Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「まあ、きっとあなたならそうでしょう。しかし問題は、私が他の人々ではなく、あなたを選べるかどうかということだ。あなたはワープジャンプの数時間前に乗り込んできたが、まだ何の頭角を現していない。現状、あなたが自由開拓者の役割に適しているかどうか、疑問に感じている」
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうでしょう。あなたならそうじゃない？問題は、私が他の人々ではなく、あなたを選ぶ準備ができているかということです。あなたはワープジャンプの数時間前に乗り込んできましたが、まだ何の頭角を現していません。現状、 あなたがローグトレーダーの役割に適しているかどうか、私は疑問に感じます」
「まあ、きっとあなたならそうでしょう。しかし問題は、私が他の人々ではなく、あなたを選べるかどうかということだ。あなたはワープジャンプの数時間前に乗り込んできたが、まだ何の頭角を現していない。現状、あなたが自由開拓者の役割に適しているかどうか、疑問に感じている」

languages.text: « Oh, mais je n'en doute pas. La question est plutôt de savoir si je suis prête à vous choisir parmi les autres. Vous êtes {mf|monté|montée} à bord quelques heures seulement avant le saut Warp, mais ne vous êtes pas encore {mf|distingué|distinguée} de quelque manière que ce soit. En l'état actuel des choses, je doute que vous ayez l'étoffe d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, mais je n'en doute pas. La question est plutôt de savoir si je suis prête à vous choisir parmi les autres. Vous êtes {mf|monté|montée} à bord quelques heures seulement avant le saut Warp, mais ne vous êtes pas encore {mf|distingué|distinguée} de quelque manière que ce soit. En l'état actuel des choses, je doute que vous ayez l'étoffe d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Ach, tatsächlich, seid Ihr das? Die Frage lautet aber, ob ich bereit bin, Euch den anderen vorzuziehen. Ihr kamt erst wenige Stunden vor dem Warpsprung an Bord und habt Euch noch in keiner Weise hervorgetan. Nach aktuellem Stand habe ich so meine Zweifel, ob Ihr als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} geeignet wärt."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, tatsächlich, seid Ihr das? Die Frage lautet aber, ob ich bereit bin, Euch den anderen vorzuziehen. Ihr kamt erst wenige Stunden vor dem Warpsprung an Bord und habt Euch noch in keiner Weise hervorgetan. Nach aktuellem Stand habe ich so meine Zweifel, ob Ihr als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} geeignet wärt."

languages.text: "Kesin hazırsındır. Asıl soru, ben diğer adaylar arasında seni seçmeye hazır mıyım? Öte sıçramadan saatler önce gemiye bindin ve henüz kendini sivriltecek bir şey sergilemedin. Mevcut duruma bakarsak, Hür Tacir rolüne uygun olup olmadığın konusunda şüphelerim var."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest? You came aboard hours before the warp jump and have not yet distinguished yourself in any way. As things currently stand, I have doubts that you are suitable for the role of Rogue Trader."

languages.original_text: "Oh yes, you would be, wouldn't you? The question is, am I ready to choose you over the rest?
